Yumi Machino

Front-end Developer

A passionate front-end developer with a year of professional experience. I specialize in crafting user-friendly and visually appealing websites. My Skills include proficiency in HTML, CSS and JavaScript along with experience in using popular front-end frameworks such as React. I enjoy the process of transforming ideas into interactive and engaging web experiences.I believe in continuous learning and improvement. I actively seek out new challenges to enhance my skills and stay ahead in the rapidly evolving field of front-end development.

Projects

DP Code Academy

Website developed for DPCode Academy, providing users access to its online learning platform. The site allows users to log in to access limited resources intended for either students or administrators. This project was executed by a team comprising UI/UX designers, front-end developers, and back-end developers. Next.js Material UI Storybook

Japanadian

This web application was developed for Japanadian, offering users access to YouTube videos posted by Japanadian and allowing them to view and share blogs. On the website, users can log in to create blog posts about Japan or comment on others' posts. This project was designed by Figma and developed using MERN stack. MongoDB Express React Node.js Figma

JTRAVEL

I designed and developed a demonstration website for a travel agency showcasing Japan, aiming to enhance my front-end skills in HTML, Sass, and JavaScript, alongside the design aspect. To improve readability and maintainability, I utilized Sass to break down style files into smaller components. The motion of the card flow was implemented using swiper.js, while the testimonials and FAQ sections were created using pure JavaScript. HTML Sass JavaScript Figma

Country Journal

The website provides users with comprehensive information about countries, including flags, common names, languages, and populations. It also offers a feature for travel enthusiasts to create and manage journals for each country, with the ability to edit or delete them later. Users can easily view a summary of all the countries they have visited and all the journals they have written. HTML CSS JavaScript Webpack Figma

Portfolio

My portfolio website showcases my skills and experience as a web developer. Based on the Bootstrap 4 resume/CV theme created by Start Bootstrap. I personalized the template by adding a project section to highlight my work and a contact section for easy communication. This customization allows me to present my projects and skills in a clear and professional manner. HTML Sass Bootstrap
